name: Touhou Mix: A Touhou Game
description:
With Touhou Mix, you can enjoy the familiar melodies on your devices!

Loaded with 424 playable songs from Touhou Project, Touhou Mix is the Touhou Project music game that allows you to feel like performing the songs.

When you play a song, the music that you hear is synthesized in real-time on your device, using your touches as MIDI keyboard inputs. Your accuracy will greatly affect the timing of the melodies.

With a high-efficiency SoundFont 2 synthesizer, you can enjoy the tunes from 127 instruments.

Touhou Mix generates music and the game proudly using MIDIs from DMBN and the GeneralUser GS SoundFont from S. Christian Collins.
